snippet: What does the Bo Xilai saga tell us about the Communist Party of China, and about power in China today, and tomorrow? Those are the questions many inside and outside China are trying to figure out. Where do you stand?
abstract: What does the Bo Xilai saga tell us about the Communist Party of China, and about power in China today, and tomorrow? Those are the questions many inside and outside China are trying to figure out. Where do you stand?

headline.main: Bo Xilai Removal Signals Communist Party Change. No, Just the Opposite. Discuss.
